title: config
description: JSON Schema for linked volcano configuration.

reference_col.title: reference group column
reference_col.description: variable name for reference group in ratio

comparison_col.title: comparison group column
comparison_col.description: variable name for comparison group in ratio

structure.title: Data Sctructure
structure.description: An array specifying the structure of the data filters (eg, phylum > class > order > family).

height.title: plot height
height.description: height in pixels for each linked chart

width.title: plot width
width.description: width in pixels for each linked chart

margin.title: plot margins
margin.description: size in pixels of each margin for each linked chart

ratioLimit.title: Ratio Limit
ratioLimit.description: The maxiumum ratio included on the y-axis (larger values are set to the upper limit)

hexbin.title: Hexbin settings
hexbin.description: An object used to configure the hexbin function

radius.title: Hexbin radius count limits (used to set domain of size scale)

min.title: minimum count to be shown in a hex (otherwise circles are drawn)

max.title: count for the maximum size of a hex (larger counts truncated at maximum size)

countRange.title: Hexbin radius size limits (used to set range of size scale)

min.title: minimum size to of a hex (in pixels)

max.title: maximum size of a hex (in pixels)
